document_data.name: Tharmoraera
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharmoraera''' was a [[prostitute|pleasure-lass]] of [[Marsember]] in [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In early spring of the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, Tharmoraera attended a secret meeting of the [[Rightful Conspiracy]] in Marsember. She was known to the others and was considered low-born. While there, she engaged in amorous activity with a member of the [[Thorntower]] family. Others remarked on this to a disguised [[Elminster]].
